conclusion: Initial speed of coach bus is 20 m/s
Distance to the puppy when the driver first sees it is 45 m
Velocity-time graph shows velocity falls uniformly from 20 m/s to 0 m/s in the interval 0.50 s to 5.0 s
Distance covered during the reaction time is 10 m
Distance covered while braking is 45 m
Stopping distance of 55 m is greater than initial gap to the puppy of 45 m
The bus reaches the puppyâ€™s position before it comes to rest; the puppy is not safe
